hero_quote: “YOUR SUCCESS IS PART OF OUR MOTIVATION”
guiding_success: Guiding your path to financial success
mission_desc: Helping individuals and small businesses with proper economic and tax planning to avoid issues, offering quality solutions and creating strategies for the well-being and wealth of the Hispanic family.
vision_desc: Our vision to lead the way in virtual accounting advisory and personal and corporate tax preparation with quality and trust is clear. We are taking steps, investing in technology, and achieving it.
key_services_subtitle: Tailored solutions for your business and family
service_1_desc: Strategic planning for individuals and families, maximizing deductions and ensuring IRS tax compliance.
service_2_desc: Full accounting, payroll, and monthly financial management services for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) seeking organized growth.
service_3_desc: Professional assistance and certification as a Certifying Acceptance Agent for ITIN applications (Form W-7), ensuring tax compliance for residents and non-residents.
values_intro: They guide our day-to-day behavior, informing how we act, the decisions we make, and how we work with each other, our clients, and all our stakeholders.
values_origin: Although we come from different backgrounds and cultures,
values_common: our values are what we have in common.
excellence_desc: We never stop learning and improving.
together_desc: We respect each other and draw strength from our differences.
people_banner_title: Our people define who we are
people_banner_desc: They inspire trust, create impact, and drive our growth as an organization.
accounting_desc: Beyond the numbers, organized accounting is the backbone of a successful and secure business.
tip_1_desc: Accounting allows knowing the real economic situation of a business, facilitating timely strategic decision-making based on concrete data, not assumptions.
tip_2_desc: It helps comply with requirements from public agencies like the Secretary of State, county, city, and IRS, avoiding sanctions, fines, and legal problems that put your assets at risk.
tip_3_desc: Accounting generates reliable and standardized information, indispensable for banks to approve credits and for shareholders to objectively evaluate the evolution of their investment.
yamily_role: Senior Tax Advisor & Virtual Strategy Leader
bio_p1_end: in accounting, auditing, and taxes, I have worked in recognized firms in Georgia providing solutions to individuals and small businesses.
bio_p2_start: I hold a degree in Public Accounting, with a
bio_p2_end: , and I am a member of IRS-accredited institutes, allowing me to stay updated on tax laws and regulations.
bio_p3_start: Today I lead the company's virtual strategy nationwide, ensuring quality service backed by innovation and technology. Additionally, I combine my passion for teaching with social commitment, teaching tax courses and
bio_p3_end: in their financial and business growth.
no_results_title: We didn't find any services for that search
s_personal_desc: Professional preparation and filing of your personal taxes.
s_corporate_desc: Tax solutions for corporations (1120 / 1120-S / 1065) and partnerships.
s_bookkeeping_desc: We keep your books up to date with accurate financial reports.
s_payroll_desc: We ensure your payroll complies with all labor and tax regulations, avoiding penalties and legal issues.
s_itin_desc: As Certifying Acceptance Agents (CAA), we process your ITIN without sending your passport.
s_formation_desc: Registration of your LLC or Corporation.
s_irs_desc: Resolution of letters, audits, and tax debts.
s_irs_tags: audit letters irs debt tax problem
s_notary_desc: Efficient and reliable notary services. Whether you need assistance with a power of attorney, a real estate closing, general paperwork, or an apostille, we are your comprehensive solution for all your notarial needs.
s_planning_desc: Strategies to optimize your growth and reduce taxes.
s_audit_desc: Full support and document preparation for IRS or state audits.
s_sales_desc: Monthly/quarterly Sales Tax management and business license processing.
s_sales_tags: sales tax licenses permits commercial business
help_us_improve: Help us improve by sharing your experience.
feedback_received: Your review has been received and is being reviewed.
open_letter_subtitle: What we do, how we charge, and why the diagnostic is vital.
letter_p1: This is an open letter to all potential clients expressing interest in hiring me or my firm for accounting and related work. I usually like to start by explaining all the possible things an accountant can do (and this list is not exhaustive, limited only to the work I do):
ps_0: Answering basic business, accounting, and tax questions (phone/email).
ps_1: Training and advisory to handle your own accounting or use accounting software.
ps_2: Integration of accounting systems with other apps or workflows.
ps_3: Consulting on QuickBooks, inventory, e-commerce, and custom Excel reporting.
ps_4: Cleanup and organization of prior accounting or closing of financial statements.
ps_5: Preparation of monthly or quarterly sales tax returns.
ps_6: Setup and preparation of payroll checks with withholdings.
ps_8: Annual individual and corporate tax returns.
ps_10: Corporate entity structuring for better tax treatment.
ps_11: Preparation of documents for loan applications.
ps_12: Review of prior years' returns (2 years back) to detect opportunities.
ps_13: Business and management advice beyond the numbers.
letter_p2: Once it is clear what an accountant can do, it is important to identify if that specific accountant is the right fit for your business. Some accountants specialize in specific sectors and company sizes, while others are generalists. Typically, the price and their ability to offer deeply relevant advice will vary based on their area of focus.
letter_p3_start: For this very reason, our firm feels comfortable charging a fixed fee for a
letter_p3_end: to determine what the work will be, what the desired outcome is, and how involved our firm will be versus the amount of responsibility the client will undertake.
diag_fee_quote: "I fully understand that you want clarity on the total investment from the start. To give you an exact and responsible quote, the diagnostic is a fundamental step."
price_p1_start: We have many clients (usually small businesses and freelancers) who pay less than
price_p2_start: That said, estimated costs for working with us on an ongoing basis typically range between
factors_text: Company size, number of transactions, employees, industry, complexity, growth rate, and assumed risk.
contact_text_start: If you want to hire my firm for $275 to decide if it makes sense for us to be your new accountant or Tax consultant, email me at:
policies_desc_start: Blue Ocean Accounting and Tax Services operates under a
rule_1_desc: Service begins only when (1) the client delivers all requested documentation and (2) payment is confirmed.
rule_2_desc: If critical documents or data are missing, the case remains in “pending” status and is not scheduled or processed until completed.
rule_3_desc: For services like returns and reports, final delivery may be conditioned on there being no outstanding balances (if applicable).
rule_4_desc: We accept Card, ACH/Zelle, transfer, and other methods approved by the company.
recurring_desc: Monthly accounting or payroll can be handled for a fixed monthly fee with scheduled payment (autopay recommended). Service will be suspended if there is a delay in payments.
terms_text: “The Client acknowledges and agrees that the contracted service will commence only upon delivery of the required documentation in full and payment. Failure to provide complete documentation or payment may result in rescheduling, suspension of service, and delays in delivery times.”
contact_hero_title: We are ready to help you
contact_hero_subtitle: Choose your preferred contact method or visit our office.
location_address: Inside CUBEWORK, 1600 Indian Brook Way Ste 100 Office R01, Norcross, GA 30093, United States
empty_msg: It seems there are no records in this period.
official_links_desc: Direct and secure links to manage your procedures with IRS and GTC.
